ygData.subject: RE: Another Question about Fear
ygData.msgSnippet: Does it make them run around uncontrollably. IS it very successful? I have never used blindness how does a NPC react when blinded? How long do both of these
ygData.messageBody:
Does it make them run around uncontrollably.
IS it very successful?
I have never used blindness how does a NPC react when blinded?
How long do both of these spells last for?


I can't wait to test it on my friends for a laugh. My Ranger wife is always
kicking me in the head while I med.


Once or twice a wizard after a failed attempted to PK me and has hid up in
the wood elf city. Would be nice to be able to make them fall off to teach
them a lesson.

The joys of playing on PvP server.

-----Original Message-----
From: I. G [mailto:shadowtg1@...]
Sent: Friday, July 16, 1999 10:22 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Another Question about Fear


From: "I. G" <shadowtg1@...>

Yes I have done it a number of times... it will let ya get in a spell or 2
on them...

Jaxim




>From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: "'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'" <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Another Question about Fear
>Date: Fri, 16 Jul 1999 09:27:11 -0700
>
>From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>
>Thanks for your answers, just what I thought.
>
>Can you tell me though does Fear work on PC's not just on NPC's. i.e. in a
>PvP situation?
>
>Thanks
>
>Nynenom
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Mystik [mailto:mystik@...]
>Sent: Friday, July 16, 1999 1:32 AM
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Fear Vs Spook the undead
>
>
>From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
>it depends on what you're fearing....if you're in unrest, just use spook
>since it's less mana....but fear is good anywhere else
>
>(\/)ystix Spellchaser
>lv 41 human cleric of The Rathe
>
>Chas Watkins wrote:
>
> > From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
> >
> > I am about to get fear. Can I still use Spook against the undead. Or
>will
> > Fear be more successful.
> >
> > It's just that Fear takes 40 Mana while Spook takes just 10 Mana.
> >
> > Thanks
> >
> > Nynenom
> > Rallos Zek
